alert.note: Alert for Pearl River; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 11:57PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, NORTHWESTERN ST. TAMMANY, SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON, SOUTHERN TANGIPAHOA AND WASHINGTON PARISHES, SOUTHEASTERN WALTHALL AND NORTHWESTERN PEARL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM CST... At 1156 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pickwick to Springfield. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Bogalusa, Covington, Franklinton, Poplarville, Ponchatoula, Abita Springs, Varnado, Albany, Madisonville, Folsom, Springfield, Sun, Enon, Crossroads, Natalbany, Robert, Bush, Dexter, and Whitehall. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 32 and 69. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 14 and 36. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 37 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
